title: Join Requirements
content: To join Nervosa Guild, you must: Be level 50+, Have a positive attitude, Be active in guild events, Use Discord for communication

title: Discord
content: Join our Discord server: Nervosa Guild

title: In-Game
content: Message our Guild Master or Vice Master in-game

title: Application Process
content: Fill out the application form below. We will review your application and contact you within 24 hours.
